Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) technology, with fuel flexibility, is one of the most promising power generation technology.
Titulo: Studies on the effects of pre-firing and sintering temperature on NSDC nanocomposite electrolytes

Sentencas: However, the high operating temperature of SOFCs has hindered their commercial applications.
Titulo: Studies on the effects of pre-firing and sintering temperature on NSDC nanocomposite electrolytes

Sentencas: As a crucial requirement to enhance its performance, SOFCs electrolytes should operate at a low temperature.
Titulo: Studies on the effects of pre-firing and sintering temperature on NSDC nanocomposite electrolytes

Sentencas: Carbonate/ceria composites are developed as electrolytes for low operating temperature SOFCs, and a better understanding of the mechanism of its ionic conductivity serves this purpose.
Titulo: Studies on the effects of pre-firing and sintering temperature on NSDC nanocomposite electrolytes

Sentencas: In this work, ceria-carbonate composite electrolyte, Na2CO3/samarium doped ceria (NSDC) were synthesized by the co-precipitation method.
Titulo: Studies on the effects of pre-firing and sintering temperature on NSDC nanocomposite electrolytes

Sentencas: The synthesized electrolytes were characterized by X-ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscopy (SEM), X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS), and UV-Vis spectroscopy.
Titulo: Studies on the effects of pre-firing and sintering temperature on NSDC nanocomposite electrolytes

Sentencas: The XRD and SEM results showed that the sintered NSDC nanocomposite comprised a single-phase dense electrolyte structure.
Titulo: Studies on the effects of pre-firing and sintering temperature on NSDC nanocomposite electrolytes

Sentencas: The crystallite size of the NSDC nanocomposite was greatly affected by the different pre -firing temperatures and different sintering temperatures.
Titulo: Studies on the effects of pre-firing and sintering temperature on NSDC nanocomposite electrolytes

Sentencas: Also, the ionic conductivity of the prepared NSDC nanocomposite electrolytes was strongly dependent on the pre -firing and sintering temperatures.
Titulo: Studies on the effects of pre-firing and sintering temperature on NSDC nanocomposite electrolytes

Sentencas: The NSDC nanocomposite electrolytes were pre -fired at 950 degrees C and 650 degrees C and sintered at 1200 degrees C and 900 degrees C respectively, had ionic conductivity in H-2 and air high as 0.36 S/cm and 0.3 S/cm.
Titulo: Studies on the effects of pre-firing and sintering temperature on NSDC nanocomposite electrolytes
